uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

controller_ip.description: Primary Tunneled Node server address. Input controller_ip as null to reset

backup_controller_ip.description: Backup Tunneled Node server address. Input backup_controller_ip as null to reset

tn_server_status.description: Enable or Disable Tunneled Node server communication When tunnel-node-server is enabled only then we see default value defined in schema.

keepalive_interval.description: The time interval between two successive keepalive messages sent to the controller. When tunnel-node-server is enabled only then we see default value defined in schema.

mode.description: Tunneled node server mode. When tunnel-node-server is enabled only then we see default value defined in schema.
